org.switchyard.component.common.composer

Class BaseContextMapper<D extends BindingData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.component.common.composer.BaseContextMapper<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - the type of binding data
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextMapper<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseRegexContextMapper

    public class BaseContextMapper<D extends BindingData>
extends Object
implements ContextMapper<D>
    Base class for ContextMapper, no-op'ing the required methods in case the extender only needs to override one of them.
    Author:
    David Ward <dward@jboss.org> © 2011 Red Hat Inc.
